en: Customer: Hello, good morning. Customer: I would like to know if I can suspend my subscription for a period of time. Agent: Yes, I will go ahead and pause your account for your next cycle. Agent: Please expect me to get back to you via your email for the confirmation of the pause. Agent: While your account on pause you will not be billed for a new month of subscription. Agent: You can still use your credits and book classes even when your account is on pause. Customer: I understand. Customer: So every month I will have to contact to renew the suspension? Agent: Apparently, our system can only process pause one month at a time. Customer: Okay. Customer: What is the best day to call each month? Agent: I can confirm that your membership will renew to the 1-month pause plan (0-credits for R$ 0.00/month) at the start of your next billing cycle, February 2. Agent: You can view this plan change in your Membership Settings under ‘Upcoming Plan.’ Agent: When your next billing cycle starts on March 2, you’ll renew onto the 30-credit plan for R$63450685 /month. Agent: If you’d prefer to renew onto a different monthly membership plan or remain paused for an additional period of time, head to your Membership Settings. Agent: There, you can explore your current credit count, plans and pause options for your next billing cycle, as well as our revamped rollover policy. Agent: If you need to make a membership adjustment, we just ask that the adjustment be made at least 63450685 hours prior to renewal date to ensure everything processes correctly. Agent: Is there anything else I can help with? Agent: It seems like you're busy right now, so I'm going to close out the chat. Agent: If you have any other questions or want to get back in contact with us, you can do so here: https://oliveira.com/ Agent: Have a great day!

Agent: You won't have access to class credit pricing without an active membership, but to give you an idea of how our system works, the number of credits needed to book a class is adjusted based on the time you’re booking, what studio you’re visiting, and what time your class is. Agent: While we’re not able to provide a definitive number right now, if there’s a particular studio you’re interested in visiting, we can give you a range of how many credits each class could be. en: Customer: Hello, good evening. Customer: I would like to ask a question. Agent: Hi Maria Fernanda Lopes, nice meeting you here on chat! Customer: Hello Maria Fernanda Lopes Agent: How may I help you today? Customer: I would like to understand the R$189 plan per month = 30 credits. Customer: Each reservation corresponds to 1 credit, is that right? Agent: Good question! Agent: Let me explain to you how das Neves works especially the 30-credit plan option. Customer: And why not 30 credits but only for 9 classes? Customer: Would it be 9 types of classes or only 9 classes in the monthly period? Customer: I don't know if my question was clear. Agent: das Neves is a monthly subscription service which provides access to the world’s largest fitness network. Agent: We partner with over 20,000 studios in cities all over the world to offer both in-person classes as well as livestream options. Agent: Each month you get a certain number of credits to use: the number of classes you can take each cycle depends on your membership plan, and you choose how to use your credits. Agent: You can book classes ranging from yoga to barre to cycling to martial arts. Agent: In many cities, there are also wellness options like massages or haircuts! Agent: When you sign up, you'll also have access to our video on-demand library. Agent: This is included in your membership, and there are tons of videos available. Agent: So if you are wanting to try out a new type of workout or just want to get in a workout at home, I encourage you to check those out. Customer: It has not yet been made clear. Customer: So I can only make 9 reservations on this plan, is that? Agent: Under the 30-credit plan, you can book and reserve as many classes as you want as long as it covers 30 credits you have since each class credit cost varies. Customer: Ahhh, got it. Customer: But why 9 lessons? Customer: That's the maximum "lesson options" I can choose from in this plan, is that correct? Customer: For example: Bike, Pilates, yoga, swimming, bodybuilding etc.. Could not be more than 9 options? Customer: No, that is not what it meant. Customer: And what does it mean? Customer: And what does it mean? Customer: Maria Fernanda Lopes Customer: Hmmmm. Customer: So shot from the head these 9 lessons? Customer: So I get those 9 lessons out of my head? Customer: Hahahaha Customer: Perfect Customer: That was it then.

Agent: I'll share with the steps with you, one moment please. Customer: Ok Agent: Before you start: Agent: Charge your eReader for at least 1 hour. Agent: Make sure you have access to a Wi Fi connection. Agent: If possible, turn off your eReader. Agent: Note: If your eReader doesn't turn off, try holding the power button to the right until you see Powered off on your screen. Agent: Press and hold the light button. Agent: While holding the light button, slide the power button to the right several times to turn on your eReader. Agent: Continue holding the light button and wait until the power light blinks rapidly. Agent: Let go of the light button. Agent: You'll see a Restoring message on the screen. Agent: I'll recommend you to perform these steps while the device is connected to the power source. Customer: Bárbara Jesus! Customer: If it does not work, is there no technical assistance?
